CTC_office

Class AllTrackBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • CTC_office.AllTrackBlock

  • public class AllTrackBlock
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the information of the system's track blocks
    Version:
    12/8/16
    Author:
    Vinayak Nesarikar

      • addBlock

        public void addBlock(java.lang.String Line,
                     java.lang.String Section,
                     int BlockNum,
                     int BlockLen,
                     double BlockGrade,
                     double SpeedLimit,
                     java.lang.String Infrastructure,
                     double Elevation,
                     double CumElevation,
                     java.lang.String SwitchBlock,
                     java.lang.String ArrowDirection,
                     java.lang.String SwitchPosition,
                     boolean Closed,
                     int ClosedTime,
                     boolean Broken,
                     java.lang.String RailroadCross,
                     int TimeToFixRail)
        Adds blocks to the track list
        Parameters:
        Line - block's line
        Section - block's section
        BlockNum - block's block number
        BlockLen - block's length
        BlockGrade - block's grade
        SpeedLimit - block's speed limit
        Infrastructure - block's infrastructure
        Elevation - block's elevation
        CumElevation - block's cumulative elevation
        SwitchBlock - if the block is a switch block
        ArrowDirection - block's arrow direction
        SwitchPosition - block's switch position
        Closed - if the block is closed
        ClosedTime - time block was closed
        Broken - if the block is broken
        RailroadCross - if the block is a railroad crossing
        TimeToFixRail - time to fix the block
